Key Match Events: Goals were scored by Sanchez (34'), Diaz (52'), Duran (82'), and Sinisterra (90+3').
Cordoba and Mojica received yellow cards for Colombia.
Tapia and Pulgar received yellow cards for Chile.
Pre-Game Insights: Colombia aimed to recover from a shock defeat to Bolivia.
Chile was at the bottom of the table after a late defeat on matchday nine.
Colombia had a strong home record, taking 10 points from a possible 12 in Barranquilla.
Chile had only won once at home against Colombia since 2001.
Chile's only win in the campaign came against Peru at home last year.
